detailsData.title: Experience
detailsData.content: Founded by attorney Neal Kuvara, leveraging his unique background as a medic and insurance adjuster to effectively handle personal injury claims.

detailsData.title: Efficiency
detailsData.content: Utilizes a fully automated, electronic, paperless environment to resolve personal injury claims much faster than competitors.

detailsData.title: Personal Attention
detailsData.content: Direct communication with lead attorney Neal Kuvara, ensuring easy access and regular updates on case progress.

detailsData.title: No Fees Unless You Win
detailsData.content: The firm operates on a contingency basis, asking for payment only if they are successful in getting you compensation.

address: 550 Las Gallinas Avenue San Rafael, CA 94903
linkNames: DO I HAVE A PERSONAL INJURY CASE?
valueProp: At the Kuvara Law Firm, we have been focused on resolving personal injury claims for more than 40 years. This is all that we do. Day in and day out, from day one, we have focused all of our efforts on getting a fair amount of money fast for people who have been hurt because of the negligence of others. Along the way, we have recovered millions of dollars for victims of car wrecks and other acts of carelessness.

testimonalData.text: You are the best personal injury lawyer in the world!
testimonalData.author: Dr. M.

testimonalData.text: This was the best treatment I ever got from a law firm.
testimonalData.author: Jerry T.

testimonalData.text: I highly recommend your very professional office.
testimonalData.author: Jose M.
